data.title: European Association of Allergy & Immunology
data.meta_description: Access the latest science, network with experts and peers, consult resources and benefit from discounted rates for our upcoming events and educational opportunities.
data.text:
EAACI is the leading source of expertise in the field of allergy, asthma and clinical immunology. Find out more about us.

We help specialists across Europe grow through our educational programmes, and award scientific excellence at every level. Discover how.

Join the EAACI family and access numerous benefits by becoming a member.

Meet the board and teams steering the Academy. Learn about our committees.

EAACI is a community which brings together stakeholders with a shared interest. Discover who we collaborate with.

Join our advocacy efforts to raise awareness about allergic and immunological diseases.

Discover the largest Allergy Congress worldwide, featuring multi-day scientific programmes happening once a year.

Explore our focused meetings: for in-depth discussion about specific topics within targeted medical communities

Attend master classes targeting professionals and specialists with a higher level of experience in exclusive workshop formats.

Join our training courses built to offer a solid foundation in specific areas, especially for those new to the field or fellows in training.

Discover the upcoming events by our National Allergy Societies and other partner societies who deal with our topics of interest.

Become an EAACI member today, gain access to exclusive membership benefits, keep track of your event registrations through our membership portal.

Access educational modules, find all of our scientific resources, gain access to our journals and the newest research in this platform dedicated to science.

Network with peers and bounce off ideas for future research and collaborations. We have dedicated groups on every aspect of allergy, asthma and clinical immunology. Get in touch!

EAACI supports medical professionals from the beginning of their studies and throughout their professional careers. Here you can find a selection of job opportunities.

A series of interactive resources that may assist and inform you and your loved ones living with allergic diseases and asthma.

EAACI works closely with more than 30 patient organisations worldwide. Get in touch with the patient organisations in your country.

Access educational modules, find all of our scientific resources, gain access to our journals and the newest research in this platform dedicated to science.

Keep up to date with all the activities of EAACI!

Read the latest coverage from our events and EAACI activities throughout the year.
